description: Episode of Series "Look at Life". A survey of fire-fighting services in Britain. Over 35,000 fire-fighters, some full-time, some part-time keep constant watch for outbreaks of fire in town or country. Shows something of life on and off duty with units of the Glasgow and London fire services; visits a Fire Research Station where experts study the cause and effect of fire. Narrated by Tim Turner.
